name: Interactive Video Plugin
author: Kaltura

sections.installation:
Important notice – Kaltura will not be releasing any new versions of the Interactive Video Plugin, but don’t worry, you can download the new and improved Kaltura All in One Video Pack for WordPress – https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/all-in-one-video-pack/

Migrating to the new plugin – it is VERY EASY to upgrade to the All in One Video Pack and still keep all of your existing content and video posts.
Here is what you need to do:
– Download and install the “All in One Video Pack” plugin https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/all-in-one-video-pack/
– Deactivate the “Interactive Video” plugin (they cannot both be active at the same time)
– Activating the new plugin will automatically assign it to your Kaltura Partner ID (no additional signup required) and your content will be displayed in the wp-admin panel.
sections.faq:
What about old players?
They will continue to function. New posts will be created with the new players that come with the current release.
Should you have any questions or need any help, please check out our Forums http://www.kaltura.org/forums/applications-and-cms-extensions/wordpress-kaltura-plugin-all-one-video-pack-forums or contact us http://corp.kaltura.com/about/contact.
